update.description:
We now have a component for ignition-math that depends on eigen. This is an attempt to create a separate debian package for that component, so that `libignition-math5-dev` does not depend on eigen.

One tricky bit is removing the eigen files from the `libignition-math5-dev` install, while including them in the `*-eigen3-dev` install. This approach is based on part 3 of [this stackoverflow answer](https://unix.stackexchange.com/a/445793).

@\_jrivero_ any ideas for how to test this?
update.title: Add separate package for eigen3 component

content.raw: perfect. I tried it yesterday but I gave up until a couple of approaches. I generally just run sed on all files when I create a new major so it will probably catch the new rules mathX like it does for the dbg package or the control file.
content.html: perfect. I tried it yesterday but I gave up until a couple of approaches. I generally just run sed on all files when I create a new major so it will probably catch the new rules mathX like it does for the dbg package or the control file.

content.raw:
I think this is working now [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign-math5-debbuilder&build=31)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-math5-debbuilder/31/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-math5-debbuilder/31/

I'm going to try to tweak the regex to reduce the number of manual edits we need to make when porting this to new major versions
content.html:
I think this is working now https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-math5-debbuilder/31/

I'm going to try to tweak the regex to reduce the number of manual edits we need to make when porting this to new major versions

pull_request.title: Add separate package for eigen3 component

pullrequest.title: Add separate package for eigen3 component

content.raw: The issue is that there are eigen3 files that will be included in both the eigen3 component and the `-math5-dev.install` file due to the wildcards. The stackoverflow, said you can install everything, then override the `dh_install` to remove some files from the plain `-dev`. I thought it was necessary to avoid duplicated files, but maybe I'm mistaken?
content.html: The issue is that there are eigen3 files that will be included in both the eigen3 component and the -math5-dev.install file due to the wildcards. The stackoverflow, said you can install everything, then override the dh_install to remove some files from the plain -dev. I thought it was necessary to avoid duplicated files, but maybe I'm mistaken?

pullrequest.title: Add separate package for eigen3 component

content.raw:
I made some changes in [e14c5bf](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math5-release/commits/e14c5bff6c19a248fb62f03050187fb0d0f768ca?at=default):

* Don’t need to define custom dh\_install if we are using .install files \(dh\_install will allocate files according to \*.install files\)
* The libignition-math5-eigen3-dev.install missed the .install extension
content.html:
I made some changes in e14c5bf:

  • Don’t need to define custom dh_install if we are using .install files (dh_install will allocate files according to *.install files)
  • The libignition-math5-eigen3-dev.install missed the .install extension
